name: HMCharacteristicValueTargetHeaterCoolerState
desc: Possible values for the target state of a device that heats or cools.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: The accessory should choose whether to heat or cool.

items.name: case heat
items.desc: The accessory should operate as a heater.

items.name: case cool
items.desc: The accessory should operate as a cooler.
